pregnant?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_BIRTHD'><xf:label>What is her birth date?</xf:label></xf:input><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_OLD'><xf:label>If birth date not documented, how old is she?</xf:label></xf:input><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_KHIV'><xf:label>Is her HIV status documented from the antenatal clinic (or other centre)?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_HAART'><xf:label>Is she currently on HAART?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_ELHAART'><xf:label>If not, is she eligible for HAART?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_BEFPEP'><xf:label>Has she participated in the Promise PEP study during a previous pregnancy?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_OTRIAL'><xf:label>Is she currently in any other trial ?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_OTRIAL_S'><xf:label>If yes, will she still be participating in this trial one week after delivery?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_MOVE'><xf:label>Does she intend to move out of the area of the study in the next year?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_PMTCT'><xf:label>Is she included in a PMTCT program?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_COMPLY'><xf:label>Is there anything that could prevent her from complying with study procedures? (probe according to SOP)</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_ELIG'><xf:label>Based on the screening procedures and questions so far: Is the mother eligible for further participation</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_DELIVERY'><xf:label>Mother related - Where does she intend to deliver?</xf:label></xf:input><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_CONSELLING'><xf:label>Is she willing to accept infant feeding option counselling from a designated research counsellor?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item></xf:select1><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_IDPAT'><xf:label>Patient ID</xf:label></xf:input><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_ID'><xf:label>Patient ID</xf:label></xf:input></xf:group><xf:group id='3'><xf:label>MSA1_complyreasG</xf:label><xf:group id='IG_MSA1_MSA1_COMPLYREASG'><xf:label>IG_MSA1_MSA1_COMPLYREASG</xf:label><xf:repeat bind='IG_MSA1_MSA1_COMPLYREASG'><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_COMPLYREAS'><xf:label>Q10a_ If yes, what could that be?</xf:label></xf:input></xf:repeat></xf:group></xf:group></xf:xforms>
